title: Interpretation of a dream about promotion at work in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a promotion in a dream shows an increase in self-confidence and other interpretations that we will explain to the single, married, pregnant, divorced, male, such as job promotion, honor and success, or I dreamed that my husband was promoted in his job, or assumed an administrative position, or got a new job, Or a military promotion by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq and more interpretations in the appendix to the article below: Interpretation of promotion in a dream Promotion: If you dream that you have been promoted in your job, this means an increase in your level of self-confidence. You may feel satisfied with yourself. Honoring in a dream. This article provides you with the interpretation of seeing honor, coronation, or promotion in a dream, according to Al-Nabulsi’s opinion. Honoring is giving a person his value because of the success or excellence of his studies or his distinguished work in the dream. Or by winning a competition or other Interpretation of a promotion in a dream Honoring or a coronation ceremony in a dream means that the dreamer will enjoy the acquaintances and friendship of prominent people, and honoring an unmarried girl in a dream and her participation in the coronation ceremony foretells that she will receive sudden sympathy from some prominent people in her life. Success and honor in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of push in all matters. If she sees that she has passed a certificate, debate, or exam, this means that she is fulfilling her desired desire and crowned with victory. Honoring success in a single woman’s dream means that joy and happiness will come to her in the near future. . Success in high school can symbolize the participation of a single woman if she sees herself obtaining a degree. Honor and success in a dream can also indicate success in life, whether in work, study, or in general. Honor and success in a married woman’s dream indicates that she She will succeed in her public life and seeing her successful in her studies is a good omen for her because it may indicate the success of her husband or children. Repeating a dream of honor and success in a dream for a married woman indicates her true success in reality, and seeing success may indicate the fulfillment of her great desire, especially if she sees In the first place is that she has achieved unparalleled success. Honor and success in a pregnant woman’s dream can symbolize certain concepts such as salvation, comfort, joy and comfort, and seeing success in a test, examination or debate is evidence that she has passed a successful stage in pregnancy. It represents a woman’s success and honor. In the dream, her due date is approaching and she will be freed from the pain of pregnancy. Success in a man’s dream and honoring him shows his aspirations and ambitions, and seeing the man as if he succeeded in obtaining a certificate indicates his success in some matters of life. If he is suffering from unemployment, he will find work, especially if he knows that he passed the exam. If the dreamer is an unmarried young man, then seeing success and honor in the dream means marriage soon. But if the dreamer gets married, then success in his dream indicates the success of his children and the coming of goodness for them. And seeing success in A dream for a merchant is evidence of profits and gains, but in a dream of an old man, it is evidence of performing the Hajj or Umrah obligation and may indicate bliss and money.

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing a scorpion in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a scorpion in a dream? Evidence of a lot of money that the viewer will obtain. Interpretation of seeing a scorpion sting in a dream? Evidence of betrayal of the closest friends. What is the interpretation of seeing a scorpion under the mattress in bed? It indicates that one of the relatives is conspiring against her and preparing for a disaster. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant scorpion In a dream? Details of a male child you will have. Interpretation of seeing a married woman in a dream stung by a scorpion? Evidence of abundant kindness and nourishment. Interpretation of a dream about a scorpion by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about the presence of a scorpion in a dream has several evidence, as Ibn Sirin confirmed that this dream, when seen, is evidence of the large sums of money that The dreamer will get it. It can also refer to a person who gossips and talks a lot about his family. A scorpion in a dream indicates a sharp-tongued enemy. Seeing a yellow scorpion in a dream is a sign of enemies who seek to destroy the dreamer’s life. A scorpion sting in a dream indicates betrayal of the closest friends Seeing a black scorpion attacking you in a dream and behaving cautiously with it is evidence that the dreamer will act wisely in some matters that he will soon manage. Seeing a dream about a scorpion for Nablus Seeing a scorpion inside the house will indicate the presence of a mischievous man close to the dreamer. Seeing a scorpion on a bed in a dream is an indication On the presence of an enemy, but from within the family. Al-Nabulsi confirmed that the scorpion in a dream is evidence of the sadness, grief, and anxiety that a person sees. Seeing someone in a dream eating scorpion meat, this indicates the money that the dreamer receives from the enemy. Interpretation of a dream about a scorpion for a single womanIf she sees an unmarried girl She is married to a scorpion in a dream, this indicates the presence of an evil person who speaks ill of her. If she dreams of a scorpion under the mattress on the bed, this indicates that one of the relatives is conspiring against her and preparing for a calamity that will cause her many problems that will harm her. Seeing a dream about a scorpion for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant scorpion in The dream is a sign that you will have a male child. A black scorpion in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates some bad events. Seeing a scorpion can be an indication of some marital problems that she will face. Interpretation of a dream about a scorpion for a married woman: Seeing a group of yellow scorpions in the place where there are In which the wife during the dream indicates that there are disagreements with the husband. To see a scorpion emerging from the anus is evidence of the presence of enemies from within this woman, and she must be very careful. Seeing eating and eating scorpion meat in a dream while it is raw is an unpleasant vision. If a married woman sees that A scorpion stings in her dream, this is evidence of an abundance of kindness and a lot of sustenance that she will soon receive. title: What is the interpretation of seeing the full name of Persia in a dream?

preview.html: Trend offers you the complete interpretation of seeing the name Fares in a dream. The name Knight indicates courage and resilience. Such a vision indicates that the dreamer has many responsibilities on his shoulders. It is natural for a person to see a strange and unrealistic dream that leads to anxiety and psychological discomfort, so there is no need for worry and fear, and we have collected for you, dear followers, all the visions and interpretations from the great books. Interpretation, and here, dear followers, we are happy to see the name Persia in a dream for married single people, pregnant women, and men. The meaning of the name Persia in a dream by Ibn Sirini. The respected scholar says that the full name of Persia in a dream changes the dreamer’s power over his life and happiness, and God knows best. Also, seeing a child His name, Faris, in Kamel’s dream indicates the end of the dreamer’s worries and problems, good circumstances, and an easy and easy life. This vision also expresses victory over the enemies in the dreamer’s life and the dreamer joining a new job that he was looking for. The meaning of the name Faris in a dream, Kamel, for a married woman, seeing a common girl called Faris. In a dream, Kamel and she was with someone she knows may indicate her marriage to that person. Also, seeing a stranger and someone calling him a knight is evidence of her marriage to a stranger, and this applies to her. Also, seeing a girl in her dream with a bowl, the name of a knight on the walls, indicates the achievement of her goals and the wishes that She seeks it in life. An unmarried girl who buys a newspaper and mentions the name Persia to her in a complete dream shows a lot of her livelihood with money, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the name Persia in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams of seeing the name Persia, this is good news about the livelihood and blessings that She will get it in her next life. Also, if a woman sees in her dream the name Knight on the walls and walls, this may indicate the fulfillment of what she wanted and her calling to God. Seeing the death of a person named Knight in a complete dream indicates her lack of confidence in making a decision, as well as an illness Malicious. Interpretation of seeing the name Persia in a pregnant woman’s dream. If a pregnant woman sees a Persian name in her dream, this is good news that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows what is in the wombs. The child’s name in general in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the provision of a good child who will help and support her and her husband in Their lives. Also, seeing the full name of Persia in a dream means good nutrition, the beginning of a life free of troubles and problems, and the end of disputes. Interpretation of seeing the name Persia in a dream for a man. Seeing a young man named Faris in a full dream indicates that he will marry a beautiful and fair girl, and God knows best. When seeing The handsome young man, heard a man fleeing from unpleasant visions of worries, troubles and sorrows. Seeing the name Fares in a man’s dream means getting rid of worries and problems and starting a quiet and beautiful life. Seeing a young man named Fares in a complete dream means that he will face many problems in his next life and God knows best. The vision is complete. A man named Faris in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a man named Fares in a dream that is complete and unknown to the pioneer, this indicates that he will get money from his work and trade. Also, seeing a man named Fares

title: Interpretation of seeing the king in a dream and talking to him

preview.html: In this article, we look at the interpretation of seeing the king in a dream and talking to him. This dream belongs to the list of ambiguous dreams in its meaning, whether the ruler is ancient or modern. It is a dream that carries many interpretations depending on the situation. The dreamer can see that he is shaking hands with the king or talking with someone. This vision raises curiosity to know what it really means and whether its symbols indicate Good or bad for the dreamer, and despite the complexity of the science of dream interpretation, some jurists such as Ibn Sirin have worked hard to interpret this dream, which is what you can. Search in the encyclopedia.Interpretation of seeing the king in a dream and talking to him.Interpretation of the dream of the king in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing the king who dreamed in a dream indicates that he occupies a great position in the state, especially if he sees an Arab king, and God knows best. In the case of shaking hands with the king, This dream represents good news for achieving the desires and goals that one seeks to achieve in reality, as well as in the case of embracing the king. Among the symbols of seeing a king shaking hands in a dream is that it indicates that he will obtain an important position in reality, and God knows best. As for seeing a non-Arab king, This dream shows something unpleasant happening to the dreamer, which is that he is being subjected to injustice. Ibn Sirin also indicated that seeing the king shaking hands, hugging him, and kissing indicates a new travel opportunity, and God knows best. If you see the dead king, this dream is one of the good dreams that indicate kindness and livelihood, and it may This dream indicates recovery from illness in the event that the dreamer is ill, and it may indicate achieving trust and returning rights to what is his. Its owner, and it may indicate that the absent person has returned from his travels, and God knows best. And if the dreamer sees that he has become a king in a dream, this vision is worthy of praise for him and indicates happiness, goodness, and abundance, and God knows best. If someone sees in a dream that he has become a king and has actually fallen ill, then this The dream serves as a message to him about the need to repent to God and atone for the sins he has committed. If the dreamer sees that he has become an unjust king, then this vision hates him and indicates worries and problems in his life. Interpretation of seeing the king in a dream for a single woman. As for an unmarried girl, if she sees the king placing a crown On her head, this vision is good news for her, whether her wedding date is approaching or that she will get a promotion at work, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees herself receiving a gift of a rose from the king, this indicates her marriage to a man who has a strong personality in reality. Seeing an unmarried woman bowing down For a king in a dream is a hateful vision and indicates her feeling of sadness and pain over some of the things that are happening to her in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a king seeing a married woman: In the case of a married woman, if she dreams that she is marrying a king, this indicates the appreciation and respect she receives from everyone. But if She saw in a dream that she was shaking hands with the king. This vision is one of the good dreams that indicates a change in circumstances for the better, specifically her financial circumstances. Among other interpretations of the dream of the king marrying a married woman, it indicates...

title: Interpretation of a dream about Eid according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Eid for Nabul: Whoever dreams of being at a feast will be saved from many problems and will obtain joy and happiness. Seeing a feast in a dream means that you will hear good and happy news. Whoever sees Eid al-Adha in a dream, this indicates a calamity that befell the pioneer, but God relieved him of his distress. Seeing Eid al-Fitr in a dream is evidence of the collapse of worries and problems, and this is what Al-Nabulsi explained. Seeing the sinner in a dream is a sign of sincere repentance. Eid al-Adha in a dream is a sign of kindness and joy. If the fortuneteller is captive, then seeing Eid is evidence of his release. Interpretation of Eid in a dream by Ibn Seeing Eid in a dream indicates happiness and joy. Eid day in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s success in study. Eid inside is a dream, the end of worries and the end of problems. Eid in a dream indicates paying off debts. Eid al-Adha is a sign of kindness and the fulfillment of dreams. Seeing Eid al-Adha in a dream is a sign of comfort. Of distress and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about Eid for a single woman. Seeing Eid during Eid is an indication of joy and happiness for an unmarried girl. Eid day in a dream for an unmarried girl. It is an indication of getting rid of worries and problems. Seeing Eid Al-Adha in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign of a new life full of joy. Eid Al-Adha In a dream for a girl, it indicates that she is a girl who will live. Eid al-Adha for single people is a sign of the high status and good position they will be in at work. Interpretation of a dream about Eid for a married woman. In a dream for a married woman, the celebration indicates joy, happiness, and freedom from marital worries and problems. Seeing Eid in a dream for a woman For a married woman, it indicates acceptance of invitations and prayers. Eid in a dream for a married woman indicates family stability. Eid indicates that this woman will achieve the dreams and goals she wants. Interpretation of a dream about Eid for a pregnant woman. Eid indicates a pregnant woman’s dream of the upcoming Christmas. If he sees a pregnant woman in a dream on the night of prayer. Eid, this is good news for the birth of a good child. Eid in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the fulfillment of your desired desires. Feasting in the sight of a pregnant woman indicates an abundance of food and a lot of money. If you see Eid al-Adha in a pregnant woman’s dream, this indicates relief from anxiety and relief from stress. Interpretation of a dream about Eid tomorrow in a dream. Seeing one night Eid in a dream indicates a feeling of happiness and joy in those days. See the point. Eid night. In a dream, the traveler’s return is approaching, or the prisoner’s plight is being released and he is released from prison. Seeing the sinner on Eid night in her sleep symbolizes repentance and the beginning of a life lived in faith and obedience. Eid night. A dream for an unmarried young man, a sign of the approaching marriage. Interpretation of seeing a celebration in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a daily celebration. It is in a dream a sign that God will compensate her after a long patience for the good she will obtain. Seeing the Eid in a divorced woman’s dream portends the approaching visit of her to the Sacred House of God to perform Umrah rituals. They symbolize witnessing the night of Eid. In the dream, overcome Consequences and start a new life without caring what people say

In a dream, the traveler’s return is approaching, or the prisoner’s plight is being released and he is released from prison. Seeing the sinner on Eid night in her sleep symbolizes repentance and the beginning of a life lived in faith and obedience. Eid night. A dream for an unmarried young man, a sign of the approaching marriage. Interpretation of seeing a celebration in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a daily celebration. It is in a dream a sign that God will compensate her after a long patience for the good she will obtain. Seeing the Eid in a divorced woman’s dream portends the approaching visit of her to the Sacred House of God to perform Umrah rituals. They symbolize witnessing the night of Eid. In the dream, overcome Consequences and start a new life without caring what people say

title: Comprehensive guides to interpreting a dream about swimming in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a dream: Seeing swimming in a dream is one of the dreams that brings calm and psychological comfort, as it is used to refer to God for it, but it is still one of the visions for which we can find many interpretations among the interpreters, according to what was stated. From the body or according to the social status of the priest, which is determined by many individuals. What is the interpretation of a dream about swimming in a dream? The vision may express that the dreamer has reached the fulfillment of many desires and that he is one of those who rely on God despite the efforts he finds that prevent him from those closest to him, but he prefers Continue on your path to success, confident. May God grant him success. The rosary in the dream of an unmarried young man may express that he has found the girl he is looking forward to marrying, and that she has many wonderful qualities that attract him to her when he sees her. Seeing the rosary in a dream for a poor person and seeing that he is holding the rosary and saying over it, in the name of God, then He succeeds in a wonderful job that raises his social level and gives him a lot. Of food. Seeing it is good news for the dreamer that he will emerge from the crises he is experiencing, whether they are related to a lack of money or personal problems that plague him in his life. In most cases the dreamer has suffered a lot in recent years and the time has come for the psychological comfort that awaits him after long suffering. If he goes If a person buys one or two, he intends to marry in the coming short period and is preparing to marry a woman with personality and beauty. Swimming in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: Praise is one of the things that calls for opening the box and brings happiness to whoever sees it in a dream. The girl who sees herself holding With the rosary and the number of rosaries repeating some of the names of God on it, you will soon meet a good young man, a strong believer in God (Glory be to Him), with whom you will live a life full of peace and stability. The future. As for a married woman, it is news of peace of mind after a long period of problems and disagreements between her and her husband, and the time has come for peace and life in a stable family atmosphere. If the man with the vision is going through a difficult period in his life or is suffering from the accumulation of debts and worries on his shoulders, he will get rid of From it soon and God will bless him beyond measure. If he receives it as a gift from a friend, then there is a benefit that comes to him through that friend, and it is the reason for positive changes in his life. It could be a project or cooperation between them and making a lot of profits from it. One of the disadvantages of seeing him lost in a dream and searching for him for a long time is a sign of many losses in money or social status that he may lose as a result of his bad actions that harm others and make them avoid contact with him. Swimming in a dream for the Imam Al-Sadiq: In the event that the dreamer loses his rosary, he must stop and consider his standing with God and repent for the sins he has committed. Whoever sees in a dream that he is sitting on a prayer rug with a rosary in his hand and mentioning the name of his Lord on it, then he is one of the righteous people known in the world for his good morals and goodness. reputation. Among people. In most cases, the divine is among the people of knowledge who do not skimp on others with his knowledge.

title: Seeing the birth of a goat in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Seeing it in a dream has connotations that differ from seeing the birth of a goat in a dream from seeing it in any other situation, and this we will learn in the following lines from your site.gptafser.com/so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing the birth of a goat in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream is that she She gives birth to a goat. Scientists interpret dreams as one of the good visions that convey good news to the monarch. And seeing a single girl in a dream of goats and feeding them, the vision indicates that the dreams of the unmarried girl will come true soon, God willing. As for the unmarried girl who saw goats in a dream, she Slaughter, the function of seeing an unmarried girl’s imminent marriage. If you see her cooking goats in a dream, it is one of the good visions because it indicates the loss of anxiety and sadness. If a single girl sees goats in her dream and they were small in size, it is a sign that she will marry an honest, honest, and chivalric man. If If an unmarried girl is working or going to school, seeing a goat indicates that she will succeed in her work or in her studies by the command of God Almighty. Seeing a girl in a dream carrying a goat, and the goat biting her hands. The dream indicates that she will marry a righteous man who fears God. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a ram in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a goat giving birth in a dream for a married womanSeeing a married woman in a dream giving birth to a goat, the vision shows that Almighty God honors the married woman with her imminent pregnancy. Seeing a married woman may indicate that she will give birth to twins, because it is known that goats give birth to more than one. Seeing a married woman cooking goat meat in a dream. Seeing that it is good news that the married woman will soon be free from anxiety and sadness, God willing. Seeing a goat slaughtered in a dream and eating it in a married woman’s dream. The vision is a function of the soon good news that the married woman will hear. One of these news A pleasant one, for example, is the fulfillment of dreams that she had wished for in her life. A married woman saw a small goat in a dream, and the fortuneteller wished that God would carry a lamb. The vision shows that God will soon grant her what she wanted. Seeing a goat in general in a married woman’s dream. It shows Her willpower and determination. Because goats symbolize strength as they adapt to all environmental conditions. A woman sees in her dream goats grazing in wide green spaces. The vision in it is an indication of many good things that the dreamer will receive in the near future. Seeing a married woman in Dreaming of a goat, the function of the vision is that the husband loves the dreamer and there is love, understanding and giving between them. In the case of a married woman who sees that a goat has been raised in a dream. The vision shows that this woman will change her life for the better by God’s command and live a happy married life. Interpretation of seeing a goat giving birth to a man in The dream and its meaning: seeing a married man in a dream giving birth to a goat, so the vision shows that his wife will become pregnant and God will honor him with twins, and God knows best. Seeing a goat in a man’s dream giving birth on his bed, and in reality he was suffering from an illness. The vision is good news for the dreamer, because it is a sign of the recovery of the disease.

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person upset in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the deceased upset in a dream or a dream via the website roy2a.com Seeing the deceased in a dream indicates the dreamer’s weakness in worship and his distance from getting close to God or the abundance of sins and disobedience, and it may indicate the deceased’s need for prayer and zakat on divorcees and widows and offering it. Interpretations of the great imams in interpreting dreams and visions, such as Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, and other interpreters, ancient and modern. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing a deceased person angry in a dream indicates that the dreamer is facing a major problem or adversity and is trying Escape from it. Seeing a dead person crying loudly in a dream indicates hearing bad news or a misfortune. Seeing a sad dead person in a dream indicates his need for charity. Seeing a dead person with a gray face in a dream is for an unmarried young man. It indicates that he is in great distress and trouble and must He seeks refuge in God and prays a lot. See also: Interpretation of seeing a silent dead person in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the deceased upset in a dream for a single woman? Seeing the warnings of the dead in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the wrong behavior of the girl. If an unmarried woman sees her deceased father warning her in a dream, it indicates that he He has committed a lot of sins and needs to return to the straight path. If an unmarried girl sees someone close to her who is upset and sad and indicates that he sent her a message not to go on this path, perhaps it was bad for her. Seeing the deceased angry and scolding in a lonely dream announces the lack of prayers for him and his need to Charity. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking about someone in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a deceased person in a dream for a married woman? If a married woman sees that one of her relatives has died, it shows her sadness and turmoil in her sleep. It indicates problems and issues in the woman’s life and could be a warning message of a bad path in life. The future. Seeing a sad person in her dream indicates distance from God and the shortcomings of worship or her many sins and disobedience to her husband. See also: Interpretation of seeing a deceased person wanting a blanket in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a deceased person upset in a dream for a pregnant woman? Dreaming of the death of a deceased person in a dream about a pregnant woman, and it indicates problems. And the difficulties he faces, and he has to go to God and pray a lot. A dream about a dead man is sad and he scolds a pregnant woman. It indicates the necessity of complying with God’s commandments and doing a lot of goodness and supplication. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking for coffee in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream for a divorced woman? I dream of a dead person with distress in a dream. A dream about a divorced woman indicates a difficult stage in her life and she must be careful and turn to God to alleviate her suffering. If a divorced woman sees a dead person angry at her, it indicates bad behavior and many sins. If a divorced woman sees a sad and sullen face, it indicates a lack of good deeds and the necessity of prayer. See also: Interpretation Seeing a dead person asking for tea in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream of the dead fighting with the living? Dreaming of a dispute with a dead person with a fortune teller in a dream, which indicates the dreamer’s many sins and misdeeds. Seeing disputes and quarrels with the dreamer.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about fish from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about fish: Seeing fish is one of the visions that some people like to see because of its good effects. However, there are indications that at first glance it may seem distasteful to see fish. Fish can be dead or rotten, and can be salted, grilled, or fried. What concerns us in this article is to mention all the details and instances of a dream about a fish. Learn about the interpretation of a dream about fish from Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about fishSeeing fish in a dream represents spiritual direction and religious beliefs And spiritual values ​​and ideals. This vision also indicates great benefits and advantages, various changes in life and projects aimed at making money. If you see that you have a fish, this indicates gaining prey, removing obstacles, assuming high positions and many changes. As for if The fish is corrupt, this symbolizes its corrupt origin and the source of illicit money and forbidden food. And if you see the fish opening its mouth and looking like a whale, this means imprisonment and many restrictions that prevent a person from reaching his goal. If a person sees that he is catching fish, this expresses the achievement of what he aspires to. And reaping many profits. Interpretation of a dream about fish by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing fish indicates a halal diet, a good life, a change in status, and the achievement of many goals and desires. This vision also indicates prevailing anxiety, sorrow and fears about the future, and unhappiness in the future. Earning a living and radical changes in lifestyle. Seeing fish is also an indication of women, emotional experiences, marriage, and intercourse. The vision may indicate travel in the near future and frequent travel and movement from one place to another. If one sees that he is eating fish, this expresses that he is occupying High positions and ranks, and he will be promoted to a position that he was looking for and desired from within. From another point of view, the fish could be an indication of machinations and conspiracy behind your back or deception that you may fall into through negligence and good intentions. But if there are multiple fish, this indicates ambition and love. Leadership and selfishness in some matters, imposing opinion, control, and profit. Interpretation of a dream about a fish by Imam al-Sadiq. Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq says that seeing a fish symbolizes women, great spoils and benefits, and obtaining a legitimate livelihood. This vision also expresses major changes that will move the viewer from one place to another. For his benefit. And if he sees that he is eating fish, this expresses the spaciousness of life, prosperity, a change in scales, the goodness of life, and the achievement of many successes. But if he sees that he has a lot of fish, this indicates a rise in jobs, positions, reputation, and status. Seeing fish is Also an indication of sultans, princes, ministers, influence, authority, spoils, concubines and virgins. If one sees that he is catching a fish that he has never seen before, this indicates marriage to a woman who has power and money. Interpretation of a dream about fish for a single woman: Seeing fish in a dream for unmarried people symbolizes gossip and

title: Interpretation of smoking tobacco in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Learn the interpretation of smoking in a dream in detail. Dreams are defined as a series of fantasies and visual scenes that depict a set of situations of many places and people during a person's night's sleep, the events of which may not be realistic or interconnected in reality, but appear largely logically in the dream. It is common that dreams carry many, many It is one of the symbols and signs that carry realistic meanings in human life, so individuals seek to interpret their dreams and find out their meaning in order to know what the future holds for them. It is universally accepted that smoking is one of the most dangerous habits and behaviors and harmful to human health, so it urges many to quit smoking and abstain from smoking. Tobacco in all its forms and types. good or bad; This is what you will learn in the following article from the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of smoking tobacco in a dream Commentators have indicated different interpretations of seeing smoking in a dream depending on the situation in which the person who saw the vision saw himself in the dream: If one sees someone smoking in a dream, this is a sign of a relationship Be realistic with this person. But it will cause a series of problems and disagreements between them. While when you see someone you know smoking cigarette ashes in a dream, this is a sign that the visionary will gradually get rid of his worries and problems, God willing. Also, whoever sees in his dream a familiar person smoking and exhaling a large amount of smoke like a cloud of His mouth, this is a sign that the dreamer cares about that person and that he takes care of him and takes care of him. Many. Whereas if this person blows smoke in the face of the visionary, this is an indication that he is an annoying person and brings bad luck and misfortune to the visionary. A pack of cigarettes in a dreamWhen one dreams of a pack of cigarettes, whether open or closed, this means that the dreamer will have a friend Money and status. While an empty snuff box in a dream indicates the presence of a close friend of insight who loves him deeply and cares for him. Also, lighting cigarettes in a dream indicates that the dreamer has begun to achieve profits and success in his new work, but if the dreamer lights a cigarette for someone else, this means He will gain abundant wealth as a result of his knowledge. Face. While a broken cigarette in a dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer from a major health problem, God Almighty will try to prevent him from greater suffering. Interpretation of a girl’s dream of smoking When an unmarried woman dreams that she is smoking, this is a sign that she is accompanied by many bad friends of bad faith and morals. Who wish to harm her, such as when she sees an unmarried woman smoking with a feeling of joy and happiness. For the sake of evil companions who want to steal all of her possessions. However, if an unmarried woman sees herself smoking with a feeling of sadness and sorrow, this indicates that there is abundant good for her, represented by her repentance from sins and transgressions and returning to the path of repentance and faith. Seeing an unmarried woman quitting smoking indicates Also to give up her bad habits. When an unmarried woman dreams that someone is forcing her

Who wish to harm her, such as when she sees an unmarried woman smoking with a feeling of joy and happiness. For the sake of evil companions who want to steal all of her possessions. However, if an unmarried woman sees herself smoking with a feeling of sadness and sorrow, this indicates that there is abundant good for her, represented by her repentance from sins and transgressions and returning to the path of repentance and faith.
